instruction: With this tool, you can download YouTube videos as MP3 or MP4.
warning_text:
Downloading and conversion may take 1‚Äì2 minutes depending on the video length.
Status and error messages will be displayed below in the box.
MP4 videos take longer because they are larger!
step1:
Copy the YouTube URL:
- Click on "Share" on the video and copy the link.
- Alternatively, just use the URL from the address bar.
step2:
Choose the format:
- MP3 for music.
- MP4 for videos.
step4: Optional: Enter a custom filename (otherwise the video title will be used).
step5:
Optional: Choose a subfolder:
- Select New to create a new folder.
- Otherwise, the video will be saved in Others.
This is useful if you want to organize music.
For example, one subfolder for Sido, one for Eminem, and so on...
Recommended for MP4 YouTube videos!
note:
Note: You can cancel the download at any time.
Refreshing or closing the page will remove all updates, but the process continues in the background.
Thus, a download process can be started and the page can be closed.
However, in case of errors, only the server logs can show why and if the download failed!
playlist_note:
Playlists are supported.
Simply insert the playlist URL.
‚ö†Ô∏è Warning ‚ö†Ô∏è
- Downloading playlists requires specifying a subfolder!
- Custom filenames are not supported!
- Already existing videos (according to filenames, not YouTube-URLs) will be skipped.
retrieve_info:
‚ö†Ô∏è Attention ‚ö†Ô∏è
Before the download starts, the script collects the information of the video(s) to check if it is/they are available.
For large playlists, this may take a while.
copy_note: Note: If you encounter issues, please click the Copy to Clipboard button and send it to me.
cache_note:
Can be used for failed downloads of a playlist that has not been modified.
This option skips gathering information and uses the already saved information, if those are already available!
custom_filename:
Custom Filename (optional; no file extension)
Example: All the single ladies - Beyonce
subfolder:
Subfolder (optional)
For example, if you want to organize songs of a specific artist into a folder or organize music in general.
If you want to create a subfolder named Eminem within the Rap subfolder, for example, select 'New' and enter Rap/Eminem. This will create the Eminem folder inside the Rap folder.
disclaimer_text:
This tool is intended for private and non-commercial use only. Public usage is not allowed.
This project was created independently, and all rights belong to
